paragraphs.content: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth, may Israel now say:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth, may Israel now say:

paragraphs.content: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth: yet they have not prevailed against me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth: yet they have not prevailed against me.

paragraphs.content: The plowers plowed upon my back: they made long their furrows.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The plowers plowed upon my back: they made long their furrows.

paragraphs.content: The LORD is righteous: he hath cut asunder the cords of the wicked.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord is righteous: he hath cut asunder the cords of the wicked.

paragraphs.content: Let them all be confounded and turned back that hate Zion.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let them all be confounded and turned back that hate Zion.

paragraphs.content: Let them be as the grass upon the housetops, which withereth afore it groweth up:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let them be as the grass upon the housetops, which withereth afore it groweth up:

paragraphs.content: Wherewith the mower filleth not his hand; nor he that bindeth sheaves his bosom.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Wherewith the mower filleth not his hand; nor he that bindeth sheaves his bosom.

paragraphs.content: Neither do they which go by say, The blessing of the LORD be upon you: we bless you in the name of the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Neither do they which go by say, The blessing of the Lord be upon you: we bless you in the name of the Lord.
